title: UK government considers removing Andrew from royal line of succession
desc: The former Duke of York is eighth in line to the throne meaning he remains eligible to be King.

title: Ted Sarandos Rips James Cameron For "Paramount Disinformation Campaign"
desc: Ted Sarandos is bummed out & betrayed that James Cameron believes it would be "disastrous" if Netflix bought some of Warner Bros' key assets.

title: Canada looks to USMCA review after Trump's tariffs struck down
desc: Canada, the US and Mexico are gearing up negotiations as part of a review of the USMCA this summer.

title: NASA report declares Starliner incident a type A mishap
desc: NASA's investigation into the Starliner flight that stranded two astronauts on the ISS for 93 days has been released, and the agency has officially classified the incident as its highest-level mishap.

title: Gogglebox’s Ellie shares sweet relationship insight after romantic Valentine’s Day
desc: Gogglebox star Ellie Warner shared a sweet relationship update about her partner Nat Eddleston.

title: Inside the Violent and Emotional Multiverse Revenge Movie
desc: 'Redux Redux' is an indie sci-fi movie that took three siblings ten years to make.

title: USA and Canada to meet in Olympic men’s ice hockey gold medal game
desc: Canada rallied past Finland on a late Nathan MacKinnon winner before the US powered past Slovakia to set up a blockbuster men’s Olympic hockey gold medal game in Milan

title: Fury over Discord’s age checks explodes after shady Persona test in UK
desc: Persona confirmed all age-check data from Discord's UK test was deleted.

title: Was Anyone at Fault in Sierra Nevada Avalanche Deaths?
desc: Officials in Nevada County, Calif., are investigating whether there could have been criminal negligence involved in the disaster that killed at least eight people.

title: Trump 'considering' limited military strike on Iran
desc: Trump's new threat came a day after he appeared to give Iran about 10 days to agree to a deal to curb its nuclear programme.
